title: NEW Amazon KDP Niche with NO Competition - Shaped Word Search Tutorial

tactics.name: shaped_word_search_niche
tactics.description: Create word search puzzles integrated into shapes/images with low competition
steps: Use Book Bolt for research and creation
Sort top 100 activity books by keyword 'word search'
Customize puzzles with 20x20 grids and 3-20 words per puzzle
caveats: Requires transparent file format for images
source_quotes: there are only 2,000 results which is significantly lower than other word Search keywords out there

tactics.name: Design Shape-Based Word Search Puzzles
tactics.description: Create puzzles with specific shapes and themes using Book Boldt's design tools.
steps: Design shapes like houses or robots using transparent files
Upload CSV files with word lists (max 20 characters per word)
Add custom borders and illustrations from Pixabay/Unsplash
Organize solutions per page to reduce page count
caveats: Ensure balanced sliding patterns for readability
source_quotes: Ensure there's a sliding pattern so both sides look balanced.

tactics.name: CSV File Setup
tactics.description: Prepare a CSV file for puzzle creation using Canva's template
steps: Format text with white font on dark background
source_quotes: 'we should make our font lighter let's use white to make it pop here'

tactics.name: Cover Design
tactics.description: Create a book cover with visual hierarchy and branding elements
steps: Add title text with shadow effects
source_quotes: 'add a subtle black shadow... offset use one'

tactics.name: pro_plan_puzzle_creation
tactics.description: Recommended KDP plan for puzzle creation software access
steps: Select Pro Plan for puzzle creation tools
source_quotes: you do need the Pro Plan to do the puzzle creation software

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize
source_quotes: this book is doing $49 a day about $1,500 a month which I say is pretty good considering the low competition

heuristics.name: Review Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize design optimization
source_quotes: 'if your file doesn't meet the requirements you can use random word sentences as a backup'

heuristics.name: discount_threshold_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If review count is low, boost discount strategy
source_quotes: get a discount by using the link and coupon code

claims.statement: Shaped word searches have significantly lower competition than standard word searches on Amazon
source_quotes: there are only 2,000 results which is significantly lower than other word Search keywords out there

claims.statement: KDP allows solutions to be placed after all puzzle pages to save space.
source_quotes: Place Solutions after all the puzzle Pages or after each puzzle to save space.

claims.statement: CMYK color format is recommended for print quality
source_quotes: 'cmk is basically better for printing than RGB'

claims.statement: Pro Plan is required for puzzle creation software
source_quotes: you do need the Pro Plan to do the puzzle creation software

niche_patterns.example: shaped word search + low competition + puzzle customization
niche_patterns.description: Leverage niche-specific puzzle formats with limited market saturation
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines educational value with visual creativity in a underserved format
source_quotes: this book right here is a shaped word search as you can see it is a word search but it is in a you know not a boring square

niche_patterns.description: Combine educational themes with age-specific design elements to target niche markets.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets specific demographics with visually engaging content
source_quotes: For puzzles targeting older audiences, consider adding more puzzles per page.
